articles.title: Trump Says Video Showing Items Thrown From White House Is AI After His Team Indicates It's Real
articles.summary: WASHINGTON (AP) â€” President Donald Trump said Tuesday that a video circulating online that showed items being tossed out of an upstairs window of the White House was created with artificial intelligence, despite his press team seeming to confirm the veracity of it hours earlier.

articles.title: Anthropic completes new funding round at $183 billion value
articles.summary: Anthropic has closed a deal to raise $13 billion from investors in a new funding round that nearly triples its valuation to $183 billion, including dollars raised a larger-than-expected haul that makes the artificial intelligence company one of the most valuable startups in the world.
articles.translated_title: Anthropic completes new funding round at $183 billion value

articles.title: Appleâ€™s lead AI researcher for robotics heads to Meta as part of latest exits
articles.summary: Apple Inc.'s lead artificial intelligence researcher for robotics has departed the company to join Meta Platforms Inc.'s competing effort, part of an exodus of AI talent from the iPhone maker.

articles.title: Nvidiaâ€™s $286 billion rout takes stock below key level
articles.summary: Nvidia Corp. closed below a key technical level for the first time since May as investors continue to rotate out of the leading maker of artificial intelligence chips.

articles.title: Fairfax Co. pilots AI for nonemergency 911 calls
articles.summary: Fairfax County is testing the use of artificial intelligence to triage nonemergency 911 calls, with hopes of getting residents and visitors help faster.

articles.title: How Generative Artificial Intelligence Is Shaking Up Enterprise Software
articles.summary: Since generative artificial intelligence arrived, a big debate on Wall Street has been its impact on enterprise software companies.

articles.title: How AI Firms Like OpenAI and Meta Are Stealing Music: Investigation
articles.summary: How AI firms like OpenAI and Meta steal music by scraping copyrighted works to train generative artificial intelligence systems, according to ICMP.

articles.title: Anthropic Raises Its Valuation to $183 Billion in New Funding
articles.summary: The artificial intelligence start-up garnered another $13 billion as its valuation rose by nearly three times, from $61.5 billion earlier this year, amid a frenzy over the technology.

articles.title: Salesforce investors hope for faster growth, AI progress in earnings
articles.summary: Investors want to see Salesforce's Agentforce artificial intelligence tool for customer service pick up traction.
